RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 35. Maiden Claiming Purse 21200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, For Each $2,500 To $10,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEYFORNOTHING stalked the dueling pair along the inside down the backstretch around the far turn, swung out four wide into the upper stretch and finished well to just get up under strong handling. WESRIGHT dueled for the early lead while racing from the outside of Danny's Winkster and kept on gamely to the wire to just miss. DANNY'S WINKSTER dueled for the early inside of rival and gave way grudgingly late. TIZNOW TIME dropped back to race off the early pace, raced three wide around the far turn and lacked a bid. SUPER DREAMER settled to the back of the pack early, saved ground and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Moneyfornothing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked duel, swung 4-wide upper stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiznow Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3-wide far turn, lacked bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 20600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JEFFERSON SECURITY pressed the early pace from the outside of foe and finished well to edge clear late under strong pressure. BOO TOO vied for the early lead from the inside of foe, angled out nearing the sixteenth pole and kept on gamely to the wire. MONKEY WRENCH chased the early pace, raced five wide into the upper stretch and made a late gain. ALLEGHENY HERO raced off the early pace setters, was near the inside around the far turn, angled out to race four to five deep and raced evenly with no closing run. CHARTERED COURSE was void of early speed, raced five to six wide into the upper lane and lacked a bid. JUBA'S YANKEE ONE raced two to three wide around the far turn and never was a factor. SWEET T chased the pace from the inside and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Jefferson Security
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Allegheny Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside turn, angled 4-5 wide, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Juba's Yankee One
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2-3 wide turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Chartered Course
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 5-6 wide upper stretch, lacked bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 14500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Three Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALTY SAUL chased the early pace, raced from the inside around the far turn, made a good rail bid in the drive and just got up strong handling. K K CAN broke through the gate pre-race, dueled for the early lead from the inside and kept on gamely to the wire. BET THE QUEEN raced off the early pace setters, moved up four to five wide in the drive, surged late and missed in a game effort. BLACK PANDA broke slowly, chased the pace while racing three wide and kept on in the stretch run and while racing three to four wide. GRAM'S GAL was hustled from the outside, raced two to three wide around the far turn and raced evenly. LUNAR PRAYER dueled for the early lead from the outside of foe and weakened in the lane. LADY LICIOUS raced five to six wide into the upper stretch and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: K K Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate pre-race, duel inside, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Licious
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Cefalu John
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5-6 wide upper stretch, lacked bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,50 0 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIENTE LA BRISA was away alertly, chased the pace while racing three wide from the outside of foes and finished determined under strong handling. NORDIC DANCER off slowly at the start, moved up five wide into the upper stretch and finished gamely to the wire. CHEROKEE CASTLE coaxed along throughout, raced three to four wide between rivals in the drive and finished willingly to the wire. CRAFTY WINDSOR CAT was sent clear to set the pace and weakened in the final stages. TRUE FLIRT chased the pace from the inside and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Castle
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: True Flirt
ENTRY.OWNER: Rogers Louie and Lewis Jr William R

ENTRY.NAME: Nordic Dancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Grams Racing Stable LLC and Finger Karone

ENTRY.NAME: Siente La Brisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, chased 3wd outside foes, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 11, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs . (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISE A SPEIGHTS pressed the pace from the outside of foe, took command into the far turn and was well clear while being kept to pressure in the drive. AUTS REVOLUTION showed good early foot from the inside and was no match for the winner. CHARITABLE VISIT stalked the early pace setters, raced three wide in the drive and kept on to the wire. ROYAL CRUSADER settled off the early pace, raced along the inside around the far turn and raced evenly with no rally. MINE TO HOLD settled off the early pace, raced near the inside and lacked a bid. UNCLE JEROME was off slowly, saved ground and never threatened. THE IRON BANK dropped back early and failed to respond. RESPECT FOR ALL stalked the pace along the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Crusader
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, inside far turn, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Auts Revolution
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Jerome
ENTRY.OWNER: Quaintance Janet and Hickory Made Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Raise a Speights
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, drew off, kept to pressure

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Consi dered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICING showed good early foot, crossed over to the inside shortly after entering the backstretch to set the pace, raced well clear through the upper stretch and was kept to pressure to prove best. MR CHANCE ROMANCE was coaxed along while racing two wide but was no match for the winner. RED HOT TODDY stalked the pace, raced along the inside around the far turn and raced evenly with no closing run on the top pair. HILLBILLY ROCK dropped back early to race off the early pace, raced three deep near the five sixteenths pole and lacked a bid. DONNIE B was forwardly placed to lay up close early and faded along the iside. ENTRY TIME reared at the break and unseated his jockey.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Toddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside far turn, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Chance Romance
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Ra ce Since November 11 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL SPY pressed the pace from the outside of foe and forged clear to prove best under strong handling while racing just off the inside. RIDICULOUS in tight quarters at the break, raced mid pack early on, was five deep into the upper stretch and finished willingly to the wire. CHARLIE POTATOES settled off the early pace, raced near the inside around the far turn, shifted six wide though the drive and gained ground late well. MORE PLEASE raced with the second flight early, raced near the inside and finished willingly to the wire. CLOSE THE CASE was coaxed along while racing three wide from the outside of foes and weakened in the drive. SUBJECT TO CHANGE showed good early foot from the inside of foes and weakened the final eighth of a mile. MANOLITO stalked the pace early pace from the outside, raced seven wide into the upper stretch and had no late rally. WICKED MAD dropped back early, saved ground and never threatened. DIVINE LAW raced off the early pace, was four deep near the eighth pole and had no response. BOURBON OVER ICE raced mid pack and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Mad
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie Potatoes
ENTRY.OWNER: Knapp Richard M and Brafman Larry N
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, inside far turn, shifted 6-wide, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Subject to Change
ENTRY.OWNER: Devane William E and King Adam

ENTRY.NAME: Ridiculous
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, 5wd upper stretch, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 20600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VEGAS PRINCESS showed good early speed to set the early pace and held safe to prove best under steady handling. IMINCHARGENOW chased the early pace, raced two to three deep in the stretch run and finished willingly to the wire. SWISS HORIZON raced mid pack early on, made a four to five wide bid and kept on to the wire. BANK CARD raced off the early pace, raced near the inside around the far turn, swung six wide into the upper stretch and made a good late bid. WARRIORINTHEHOUSE dropped back early, raced near the inside around the far turn, shifted four wide and raced evenly with no closing run. LAURA'S GRAND stalked the pace, raced four to five wide and had no late gain. WEAVINYOUINTHEDUST hustled along, raced five deep in the lane and lacked a bid. LITTLE O LITTLE E hustled to lay up close and faded along the inside. GATTOLOTTASPARKLE saved ground and never threatened. KNOBIESMAGICSONDE stumbled at the break and unseated his jockey. HALF-MILE FRACTION PROVIDED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Swiss Horizon
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4-5 wide bid, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Bank Card
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, swung 6wd upper stretch, late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Warriorinthehouse
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside far turn, shifted 4wd, even

ENTRY.NAME: Gattolottasparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Iminchargenow
ENTRY.OWNER: Ali Andrew and Schottroffe Edward T
